"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bf336b6368725948360a00#post_54bf336b6368725948360a00
My Half-assed translations of that Decade Fresh precure comic.

Upperright panel: So this is the world of Precure...

Upperleft panel: Who are you? Are you a Labyrinth? What are you talking about? I'm just a Kamen rider passing through, Remember that!

Middle panel: Onore Dikeido! (That's about all you need to know.)

Lowerright panel: All I got for sure was "Cure decade"

Lowerleft panel: KAMEN RIDE: FRESH PUPUPUPURIKYUA!

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bf33d563687273fca40700#post_54bf33d563687273fca40700
[bq="Silent_Witness"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bf31a563687228602e0c00#post_54bf31a563687228602e0c00
I thought it was surpassed by Kantai Collection recently, if only barely.[/bq]
Kantai was growing insanely popular. . . and recently the anime has come out.

If you're wondering how bad is the Kantai anime I thought if I was drunk I could at least get through episode 3. . . not even drunk makes the show any good.

I am legitimately depressed that the show sucks that much and I'm depressed that with the airing of the anime chances are Kantai's popularity is going to freefall soon cause the anime is *THAT* bad.
